title: Gallery for Wear
summary: Gallery for Android Wear | Save photos on Watch | Pinch Zoom
developerAddress: A-150, Tirupati Soc,Yogi-chowk, Puna-simada Road,Varacha, Surat
description: A quick look at your images on Watch without taking your phone out! Access Gallery Photos on Watch,Save Photos on Watch and Later access Saved photos When phone not connected with watch.Support All Square and Round Android Wear Watch.Features:- Select Album from List (Easy Navigation).- Select Photo from All Photos (Easy Navigation).- Save Photo on Watch.- Rotate Image.- Delete Photo from Watch.- Pinch and Double Tap to Zoom.- Single Tap to See Option.- Long Press OR Swipe Right to Close.- When Phone not connected Access Photos Saved on Watch.If Application is not in application list than open Android wear application on mobile click on setting icon and click Resync apps.Wait and check. If you find any bugs or you have any suggestions, please email me at jigneshdkheni@gmail.com in order to correct or implement it before rating.
descriptionHTML:
A quick look at your images on Watch without taking your phone out! Access Gallery Photos on Watch,
Save Photos on Watch and Later access Saved photos When phone not connected with watch.
Support All Square and Round Android Wear Watch.

Features:

- Select Album from List (Easy Navigation).
- Select Photo from All Photos (Easy Navigation).
- Save Photo on Watch.
- Rotate Image.
- Delete Photo from Watch.
- Pinch and Double Tap to Zoom.
- Single Tap to See Option.
- Long Press OR Swipe Right to Close.
- When Phone not connected Access Photos Saved on Watch.

If Application is not in application list than open Android wear application on mobile click on setting icon and click Resync apps.
Wait and check.

If you find any bugs or you have any suggestions, please email me at jigneshdkheni@gmail.com in order to correct or implement it before rating.
comments: De-installing Continuing to crash on my phone, even when not being used!
Lg g r No updates after 2 joke. Want my money back. Last reply stated would work on future updates. Why would you want me to email you? You said you would continue to update I don't see the need?
Total bull$#!t! I can't even see the full quality picture whenever I zoom in
app not worked can anyon share me how to slide gallary photo ?

Great concept. Like the app, been wishing for something liked this. My only issue with it is that I have to keep opening it on my HTC M8 for the gallery to appear on the SW3. I couldn't dig deeper to find out why, it looks like this happens when my phone sleeps. Edit: Dev fixed the sleep issue. Thanks a mill.
